properties.name: nats.connection.reconnect-wait
properties.description: Wait time between reconnection attempts in milliseconds

properties.name: nats.connection.ping-interval
properties.description: Ping interval to keep connection alive in milliseconds

properties.name: nats.consumer.max-deliver
properties.description: Maximum number of delivery attempts for messages

properties.name: nats.consumer.ack-wait
properties.description: Time to wait for message acknowledgment in milliseconds

properties.name: nats.producer.max-pending
properties.description: Maximum number of pending messages for producer

properties.name: messaging.subjects.orders.created
properties.description: Subject for order created events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.orders.updated
properties.description: Subject for order updated events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.orders.cancelled
properties.description: Subject for order cancelled events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.orders.status-changed
properties.description: Subject for order status change events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.products.created
properties.description: Subject for product created events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.products.updated
properties.description: Subject for product updated events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.products.deleted
properties.description: Subject for product deleted events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.products.stock.low
properties.description: Subject for low stock alerts (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.payments.confirmed
properties.description: Subject for payment confirmed events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.payments.failed
properties.description: Subject for payment failed events (listened by notifications)

properties.name: messaging.subjects.notifications.send
properties.description: Subject for sending notifications (published by notifications service)
